about_the_game:
Jump into the action with the 'Jump Malcolm Jump,' demo a thrilling short demo that offers a taste of the full adventure! Choose from four unique characters and embark on a journey through six engaging worlds, including a helpful tutorial to get you started. Experience the excitement of jumping and dashing across diverse environments in this sneak peek of the full game

With easy-to-learn controls and challenging game play, “Jump Malcolm Jump” is perfect for players of all skill levels. Explore vibrant worlds filled with challenges and hidden secrets as you jump & dash your way to victory."

Introducing "Jump Malcolm Jump" – The Ultimate 3D Platformer Adventure!
Get ready to embark on an exhilarating journey through vibrant worlds in this captivating 3D platformer. Jump Malcolm Jump brings you an engaging mix of fast-paced action, precise jumping, and cunning strategy, all wrapped up in an arcade-style experience that's perfect for casual gamers.

🌟 Leap into Action: Master the art of jumping and dashing as Malcolm, your charismatic hero. With each leap, you'll soar through the air, racing against time to collect precious Energy Orbs scattered across imaginative environments.

🌋 Diverse Realms: Explore an array of visually stunning landscapes, from the fiery depths of the Volcanic World to the bustling urban sprawl of City Scape. Traverse the lush greens of the Forest and even defy gravity amidst the cosmic wonders of Space. Each world is a unique challenge waiting to be conquered.

🚀 Dashing Challenges: It's not just about jumping – harness the power of the dash to blaze through obstacles and navigate treacherous terrain. Strategize your moves and execute flawless combinations to maximize your progress.

🕹️ Arcade Thrills: "Jump Malcolm Jump" captures the essence of classic arcade games, delivering an experience that's easy to pick up and play but challenging to master. Feel the rush of adrenaline as you dodge hazards and race against the clock.

🎮 Casual Adventure: Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for a quick gaming fix, "Jump Malcolm Jump" offers a dose of excitement that suits every player. Immerse yourself in the immersive worlds and embark on a journey tailor-made for casual gaming enjoyment.

🌈 Stunning Visuals: Lose yourself in a world of captivating visuals and captivating art style that brings each environment to life. The attention to detail will leave you awestruck as you leap from platform to platform.


Jump into the action-packed world of "Jump Malcolm Jump" and experience the thrill of becoming a master jumper and dasher. Will you rise to the challenge and collect all the Energy Orbs, or will you succumb to the obstacles that lie in your path? The adventure awaits – are you ready to take the leap?
Are you prepared to leap into action, dash through challenges, and conquer diverse worlds? Embark on an arcade-style journey unlike any other in "Jump Malcolm Jump"! Get ready to jump, dash, and triumph your way through visually pleasing environments and exhilarating obstacles. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for some casual fun, this 3D platformer will keep you entertained for hours. So what are you waiting for? Jump in and let the adventure begin!

name: Jump Malcolm Jump Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD 3020e or Intel I3-7020U
  • Graphics: Radeon Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a teaser of 'Jump Malcolm Jump' with our short demo! Pick from four characters and explore six distinct worlds, including a tutorial level. Get ready to leap, dash, and discover in this sneak peek of the full game.
